column4: hi, i have linux 10.04 on my laptop and if i close the lid to put the laptop on hibernate then when i open the lid again the screen doesn't turn on. the laptop is on but the screen won't show anything i've searched for the bug on launchpad but theres nothing for my laptop (hp dv5 amd 64)
Does it work correctly if you choose hibernate from the menu (and not close the lid)?
Yea the problem is in closing it
Had the same thing on my laptop. I eventually figured out it was the driver for the intel graphics card. (with the latest kernel though, X won't start at all, just completely freeze the system)
i have an ati video card
I'm using the vesa driver as a workaround.
Doesn't hurt to try. Do you have a /etc/X11/xorg.conf file?
i don't know how can i check?
